In Windows XP- Start->Run->regedit
In Windows 7/Vista- Start and write down regedit
Or you can also press WIN+R (WIN is button on keyboard next to left CTRL)

@Jug141 It means press start and type regedit into your "search program and files" to find the Windows Regedit program. Alternatively you can look in Local Disk C/Windows for regedit.exe

From what I have read this is what you have to do do get it into english

HOPE THIS HELPS

"start" search "regedit"

Computer/HKey-Local_Machine\Software\Wow6432Node\LucasArts\Star Wars The Force Unleashed 2

Edit the language from "ru" to "en"

Worked for me to get the menus in English

Xbox 360 Controller for windows works for this game as well

You may also find it without the \Wow6432Node\ as previously stated in your regedit file

"start" search "regedit"
it should look like this below:

Computer/HKey-Local_Machine\Software\LucasArts\Star Wars The Force Unleashed 2
